overview: While Elon Musk is just getting ready for the production of Tesla robots, robots from Perm, which are created by the founder of Promobot Oleg Kivokurtsev, are already working in 44 countries around the world. In the regional MFC, clients are served by the "best robot girl", Perm robots recite poems and communicate with people on equal terms. Oleg is sure that the future, in which his creations will take on all the boring and hard work, is just around the corner. But are we ready for these changes?
title: Not Far Off
